About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what i do.

Your project is in safe hands

I choose front end side of the programming, because details and visual side of website applications give me satisfaction from my work.
Im at the beggining of my programming journey, and I hope, that you can join .
My goal is to learn most of the full stack development to the end of the year. Most of the time im spending on building React Applications and learning latest trends in user experience to magnify more clients and increase on-site time.
At february i finished codecademy pro course for Web Development Career Path and from now on i started implementing my fresh knowledge.
Rest of the time i spent with my family and building bikes.

Step One

Start Full-Time job as Web Developer.

Step Two

Learn Adobe XD/ Figma to implement it in modern projects.

Step Three

Improve my full stack skills by the end of the year.
